ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the identifier of th
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the identifier of the inclusion criterion the subject did not meet or the exclusion criterion the subject met?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the subject was not eligible, Record the identifying code for each criterion that was an exception.

ReferenceDocuments.name: IETESTCD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This field is required to appear on the CRF, but may be null if there are no exceptions to the inclusion/exclusion criteria. The CRF should allow multiple exceptions to be recorded. See SDTMIG V3.2 Section 7.5.2 for assumptions regarding protocol versioning. Sponsor may provide a list of inclusion/ exclusion criteria and the unique identifying codes to the site. The list provided should be versioned/updated when the protocol changes and the criteria are changed. Sponsor should use sponsor developed controlled terminology for IETESTCD.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-14 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
